31#ifndef HB_NO_OUTLINE

33#include "hb-outline.hh"

35#include "hb-machinery.hh"
36
37
38void hb_outline_t::replay (hb_draw_funcs_t *pen, void *pen_data) const
39{
40 hb_draw_state_t st = HB_DRAW_STATE_DEFAULT;
41
42 unsigned first = 0;
43 for (unsigned contour : contours)
44 {
45 auto it = points.as_array ().sub_array (start_offset: first, seg_count: contour - first);
46 while (it)
47 {
48 hb_outline_point_t p1 = *it++;
49 switch (p1.type)
50 {
51 case hb_outline_point_t::type_t::MOVE_TO:
52 {
53 pen->move_to (draw_data: pen_data, st,
54 to_x: p1.x, to_y: p1.y);
55 }
56 break;
57 case hb_outline_point_t::type_t::LINE_TO:
58 {
59 pen->line_to (draw_data: pen_data, st,
60 to_x: p1.x, to_y: p1.y);
61 }
62 break;
63 case hb_outline_point_t::type_t::QUADRATIC_TO:
64 {
65 hb_outline_point_t p2 = *it++;
66 pen->quadratic_to (draw_data: pen_data, st,
67 control_x: p1.x, control_y: p1.y,
68 to_x: p2.x, to_y: p2.y);
69 }
70 break;
71 case hb_outline_point_t::type_t::CUBIC_TO:
72 {
73 hb_outline_point_t p2 = *it++;
74 hb_outline_point_t p3 = *it++;
75 pen->cubic_to (draw_data: pen_data, st,
76 control1_x: p1.x, control1_y: p1.y,
77 control2_x: p2.x, control2_y: p2.y,
78 to_x: p3.x, to_y: p3.y);
79 }
80 break;
81 }
82 }
83 pen->close_path (draw_data: pen_data, st);
84 first = contour;
85 }
86}
87
88float hb_outline_t::area () const
89{
90 float a = 0;
91 unsigned first = 0;
92 for (unsigned contour : contours)
93 {
94 for (unsigned i = first; i < contour; i++)
95 {
96 unsigned j = i + 1 < contour ? i + 1 : first;
97
98 auto &pi = points[i];
99 auto &pj = points[j];
100 a += pi.x * pj.y - pi.y * pj.x;
101 }
102
103 first = contour;
104 }
105 return a * .5f;
106}
107
108void hb_outline_t::embolden (float x_strength, float y_strength,
109 float x_shift, float y_shift)
110{
111 /* This function is a straight port of FreeType's FT_Outline_EmboldenXY.
112 * Permission has been obtained from the FreeType authors of the code
113 * to relicense it under the HarfBuzz license. */
114
115 if (!x_strength && !y_strength) return;
116 if (!points) return;
117
118 x_strength /= 2.f;
119 y_strength /= 2.f;
120
121 bool orientation_negative = area () < 0;
122
123 signed first = 0;
124 for (unsigned c = 0; c < contours.length; c++)
125 {
126 hb_outline_vector_t in, out, anchor, shift;
127 float l_in, l_out, l_anchor = 0, l, q, d;
128
129 l_in = 0;
130 signed last = (int) contours[c] - 1;
131
132 /* pacify compiler */
133 in.x = in.y = anchor.x = anchor.y = 0;
134
135 /* Counter j cycles though the points; counter i advances only */
136 /* when points are moved; anchor k marks the first moved point. */
137 for ( signed i = last, j = first, k = -1;
138 j != i && i != k;
139 j = j < last ? j + 1 : first )
140 {
141 if ( j != k )
142 {
143 out.x = points[j].x - points[i].x;
144 out.y = points[j].y - points[i].y;
145 l_out = out.normalize_len ();
146
147 if ( l_out == 0 )
148 continue;
149 }
150 else
151 {
152 out = anchor;
153 l_out = l_anchor;
154 }
155
156 if ( l_in != 0 )
157 {
158 if ( k < 0 )
159 {
160 k = i;
161 anchor = in;
162 l_anchor = l_in;
163 }
164
165 d = in.x * out.x + in.y * out.y;
166
167 /* shift only if turn is less than ~160 degrees */
168 if ( d > -15.f/16.f )
169 {
170 d = d + 1.f;
171
172 /* shift components along lateral bisector in proper orientation */
173 shift.x = in.y + out.y;
174 shift.y = in.x + out.x;
175
176 if ( orientation_negative )
177 shift.x = -shift.x;
178 else
179 shift.y = -shift.y;
180
181 /* restrict shift magnitude to better handle collapsing segments */
182 q = out.x * in.y - out.y * in.x;
183 if ( orientation_negative )
184 q = -q;
185
186 l = hb_min (l_in, l_out);
187
188 /* non-strict inequalities avoid divide-by-zero when q == l == 0 */
189 if (x_strength * q <= l * d)
190 shift.x = shift.x * x_strength / d;
191 else
192 shift.x = shift.x * l / q;
193
194
195 if (y_strength * q <= l * d)
196 shift.y = shift.y * y_strength / d;
197 else
198 shift.y = shift.y * l / q;
199 }
200 else
201 shift.x = shift.y = 0;
202
203 for ( ;
204 i != j;
205 i = i < last ? i + 1 : first )
206 {
207 points[i].x += x_shift + shift.x;
208 points[i].y += y_shift + shift.y;
209 }
210 }
211 else
212 i = j;
213
214 in = out;
215 l_in = l_out;
216 }
217
218 first = last + 1;
219 }
220}
221
222static void
223hb_outline_recording_pen_move_to (hb_draw_funcs_t *dfuncs HB_UNUSED,
224 void *data,
225 hb_draw_state_t *st,
226 float to_x, float to_y,
227 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
228{
229 hb_outline_t *c = (hb_outline_t *) data;
230
231 c->points.push (v: hb_outline_point_t {to_x, to_y, hb_outline_point_t::type_t::MOVE_TO});
232}
233
234static void
235hb_outline_recording_pen_line_to (hb_draw_funcs_t *dfuncs HB_UNUSED,
236 void *data,
237 hb_draw_state_t *st,
238 float to_x, float to_y,
239 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
240{
241 hb_outline_t *c = (hb_outline_t *) data;
242
243 c->points.push (v: hb_outline_point_t {to_x, to_y, hb_outline_point_t::type_t::LINE_TO});
244}
245
246static void
247hb_outline_recording_pen_quadratic_to (hb_draw_funcs_t *dfuncs HB_UNUSED,
248 void *data,
249 hb_draw_state_t *st,
250 float control_x, float control_y,
251 float to_x, float to_y,
252 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
253{
254 hb_outline_t *c = (hb_outline_t *) data;
255
256 c->points.push (v: hb_outline_point_t {control_x, control_y, hb_outline_point_t::type_t::QUADRATIC_TO});
257 c->points.push (v: hb_outline_point_t {to_x, to_y, hb_outline_point_t::type_t::QUADRATIC_TO});
258}
259
260static void
261hb_outline_recording_pen_cubic_to (hb_draw_funcs_t *dfuncs HB_UNUSED,
262 void *data,
263 hb_draw_state_t *st,
264 float control1_x, float control1_y,
265 float control2_x, float control2_y,
266 float to_x, float to_y,
267 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
268{
269 hb_outline_t *c = (hb_outline_t *) data;
270
271 c->points.push (v: hb_outline_point_t {control1_x, control1_y, hb_outline_point_t::type_t::CUBIC_TO});
272 c->points.push (v: hb_outline_point_t {control2_x, control2_y, hb_outline_point_t::type_t::CUBIC_TO});
273 c->points.push (v: hb_outline_point_t {to_x, to_y, hb_outline_point_t::type_t::CUBIC_TO});
274}
275
276static void
277hb_outline_recording_pen_close_path (hb_draw_funcs_t *dfuncs HB_UNUSED,
278 void *data,
279 hb_draw_state_t *st,
280 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
281{
282 hb_outline_t *c = (hb_outline_t *) data;
283
284 c->contours.push (v&: c->points.length);
285}
286
287static inline void free_static_outline_recording_pen_funcs ();
288
289static struct hb_outline_recording_pen_funcs_lazy_loader_t : hb_draw_funcs_lazy_loader_t<hb_outline_recording_pen_funcs_lazy_loader_t>
290{
291 static hb_draw_funcs_t *create ()
292 {
293 hb_draw_funcs_t *funcs = hb_draw_funcs_create ();
294
295 hb_draw_funcs_set_move_to_func (dfuncs: funcs, func: hb_outline_recording_pen_move_to, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
296 hb_draw_funcs_set_line_to_func (dfuncs: funcs, func: hb_outline_recording_pen_line_to, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
297 hb_draw_funcs_set_quadratic_to_func (dfuncs: funcs, func: hb_outline_recording_pen_quadratic_to, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
298 hb_draw_funcs_set_cubic_to_func (dfuncs: funcs, func: hb_outline_recording_pen_cubic_to, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
299 hb_draw_funcs_set_close_path_func (dfuncs: funcs, func: hb_outline_recording_pen_close_path, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
300
301 hb_draw_funcs_make_immutable (dfuncs: funcs);
302
303 hb_atexit (func: free_static_outline_recording_pen_funcs);
304
305 return funcs;
306 }
307} static_outline_recording_pen_funcs;
308
309static inline
310void free_static_outline_recording_pen_funcs ()
311{
312 static_outline_recording_pen_funcs.free_instance ();
313}
314
315hb_draw_funcs_t *
316hb_outline_recording_pen_get_funcs ()
317{
318 return static_outline_recording_pen_funcs.get_unconst ();
319}
